headline: Coinbase Volume Records And Deribit Deal Contrast With Valuation Concerns
summary: Coinbase Global reports record trading volume across total and crypto markets, reflecting recent operational momentum. The company finalizes its acquisition of Deribit, expanding its reach in global crypto derivatives. Coinbase broadens its threat intelligence work with Crypto ISAC, focusing on cyber risk in digital assets. At a share price of $164.32, NasdaqGS:COIN comes into this news with mixed recent performance, including a 1.1% gain over the past week and a 31.9% decline over the past...

headline: US Stock Market Today S&P 500 Futures Slip As Rate Cut Hopes Meet Volatility
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Tuesday, Feb, 17 2026 US stock futures are slightly softer this morning, with E mini S&P 500 and Nasdaq 100 contracts down around 0.2% to 0.6%, as falling bond yields clash with rising volatility. The US 10 year Treasury yield is sitting at a 2 and a half month low, which indicates investors are betting that inflation is easing and rate cuts remain on the table, a potential tailwind for mortgage costs and credit card rates. At the same time, VIX...
